panels.description: Orchestrator position, in the form [x, y, z].
panels.title: Orchestrator [x, y, z] Position

panels.description: Cart position, in the form [x, y].
panels.title: Cart Start [x, y] Position

panels.description: Racks information, namely its id and width.
panels.title: Racks

panels.description: Shelves information, namely its id, height, and associated rack_id.
panels.title: Shelves

panels.description: Buckets information, namely its id, width, height, and length (in cm), quantity, position [x, y, z] (m), and its associated item_id and shelf_id.
panels.title: Buckets

panels.description: Items information, namely the id, designation, width, height and length (in cm), the weight (in g) and the quantity.
panels.title: Stock

panels.description: Layouts data, namely its id, list of bucket ids, and timestamp.
panels.title: Layouts

panels.description: Devices data, namely its id, associated bucket id, and sensor id.
panels.title: Devices

panels.description: Sensors data, namely its id, associated device id, movement records, and staff_contacts.
panels.title: Sensors

panels.description: Manifests data, namely its id, associated items, timestamp, and staff id.
panels.title: Manifests

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  value
FROM example_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp
